ARABIC: كَذَٰلِكَ وَقَدْ أَحَطْنَا بِمَا لَدَيْهِ خُبْرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Our knowledge encompasses all that happened to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It was so, for We were fully informed about him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus was the state of those people, and We encompassed in knowledge all concerning Dhu al- Qarnayn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This indeed was true. We knew all that he did there.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So it is; and Our knowledge encompasses all that he possessed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So (it was)! And We knew all about him (Dhul-Qarnayn).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Even so! and We had a full knowledge of what he had.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So; and We encompassed in knowledge what was with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So (it was). And We knew all concerning him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Thus indeed it was. We had full knowledge of him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thus it was. And surely We have encompassed all that was with him, in knowledge
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So it was, and We were fully aware of whatever [means] he possessed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (He left them) as they were: We completely understood what was before him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So (it was)! And We knew all about him (Dhul-Qarnain).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So, We encompassed in knowledge what was with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And so it was. We had full knowledge of what he had.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Thus. And We had encompassed [all] that he had in knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:91] So [it was], in other words, the situation was as We have stated; and We encompassed whatever pertained to him, that is, what Dhū’l-Qarnayn possessed in the way of machinery, men and otherwise, in knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So (it was)) just as he reached the West, so did he reach the East. (And We knew all concerning him) We knew what he had of information and exposition.
